General.Name: Guangdong CHJ Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: GUANGDONG CHJ INDUSTRY CO.,LTD. produces and sells jewelries and fashion consumer goods. It offers rings, necklace, pendant, earrings, bracelet, ornaments, pendants, and other jewelry products made of gold, diamond, platinum, pearl, and jackpot materials. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Shantou, China.
